roleset.name: accumulate, gain

example.name: accrete-v
example.text: The fact sheet, dated April 1986, says on page three: ``If the price paid for a CD purchased in the secondary market ... is higher than the accreted value in the case of zero-coupon CDs, the difference ... is not insured...

roleset.note: ACCRETE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'accrete' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from accrete.01-v predicate notes)
